attributes.action: Say thanks to John Smeaton for saving many lifes in the foiled Glasgow Airport bomb attack.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We would like The Rt Hon Gordon Brown to acknowlegde John Smeaton with a simple thank you for the efforts of one brave member of the public to foil the attempts of the Glasgow Airport Car Bomb attempt.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
